column5: Looking for someone to sublease in my home between now and late July. I am leaving apartment June 1. Only furniture in home is study area, king size bed, small side desk near the bed. No living room furniture available, just open space in the living and dining room table. Kitchen will include some plates and cooking utensils. Also includes towels, shampoo, soap. Entire unit is almost 800 square foot. Wifi included.
